name: AddSshKeyToGithubAccount
description:
Add a public SSH key to your GitHub account.

Use this tool to add a public SSH key to the authenticated user's GitHub account, enabling SSH access. Authentication is required via Basic Auth or OAuth with the appropriate scope.

parameters.name: public_ssh_key
parameters.description: The public SSH key content to add to your GitHub account. Ensure it is in the correct format.

value_schema.description: The public SSH key to add to your GitHub account.

parameters.name: ssh_key_title
parameters.description: A descriptive name for the new SSH key added to the GitHub account.

value_schema.description: A descriptive name for the new key.
